page.title: 12BURRINGTON SCHOOL
page.content: { BURRINGTON SCHOOL}HAS SEVENTY-TWO CHILDREN AGED FOUR TO ELEVEN.WE ARE IN EACH OF THE THREE CLASSES FOR TWO OR THREE YEARS. MOST OF US LIVE AT LEAST A MILE FROM THE SCHOOL AND SO WE TRAVEL TO AND FRO BY CAR. {THE LESSONS}WE HAVE ARE MATHS,ART, ENGLISH,READING,RELIGIOUS EDUCATION, MUSIC,PHYSICAL EDUCATION,SWIMMING, GAMES,HISTORY,GEOGRAPHY AND SCIENCE. {OUR TEACHERS}ARE MRS.VINCENT,MRS. BURGESS,MRS WARREN,AND MR.HILTON (WHO IS ALSO THE HEADMASTER). THE SCHOOL COLOURS ARE NAVY,WHITE AND SCARLET.THE SCHOOL HAS IT'S OWN PLAYING FIELD,WITH A CLIMBING FRAME AND BAR. {EACH YEAR}IN THE SUMMER WE HAVE A SPORTS DAY, A SWIMMING GALA AND A SCHOOL PICNIC.IN THE AUTUMN TERM WE HAVE A HARVEST FESTIVAL. AT CHRISTMAS WE HAVE A PARTY AND WE DO A CONCERT FOR OUR PARENTS AND THE OLD FOLKS.
